name: Escape The Factory (Zoey-21)
description:
There are 16 levels and 1 boss at the end.  To leave a level enter the portals that the enemies came out of.  The light on the bottom of the level button turns on if you beat the level without getting hit.  

Level music by ButterBees

Source Code: https://github.com/Zoey-21/Escape_The_Factory
